fullText: This ingenious adaptation of John Buchan's thriller novel manages to be both a loving tribute to Alfred Hitchcock's film version and a deliriously funny spoof of it.
dtliExcerpt: This ingenious adaptation of John Buchan's thriller novel manages to be both a loving tribute to Alfred Hitchcock's film version and a deliriously funny spoof of it.
